response.job_title: Computer and Systems Engineer of the National University of Colombia with an emphasis on software development.
response.summary:
Computer and Systems Engineer of the National University of Colombia. Able to work under pressure and in team. With Hight level of responsibility, punctuality, leadership, compliance, creativity and ability in abstraction, analysis and problem solving. 
    
Knowledge in:
Databases: PSQL Oracle, SQL server, Sybase, PostgreSQL. 
Programming languages: C++, Java, Python, Ruby, Html, Javascript. 
Frameworks Web: 	Angular, React, ReactNative
Automated tests: Robot Framework.
Data Science: Knime
response.skills: Java Development, Java, JavaScript, Desarrollo de software, Programación, AngularJS, HTML5, Servicios web, SQL, Liderazgo de equipos, MySQL, Scrum, Metodologías ágiles, Aplicaciones web, Patrones de diseño, React.js, Desarrollo web, Git

profile_positions.description:
In the first month, I developed a module of configuration for the transit web application, Front-end was built with Angular 6 and Back-end was built with Java EE and it exposed REST services.
The following step was to learn and give support to the transit web application. I was in charge of creating reports, tickets and receipts with Jasper that were generated upon user request.
I also had to build a web module responsible for generating and managing the permissions of all public transport companies and their drivers. For this, I used Spring Boot to build the Back-end layer and AngularJS for the Front-end.
profile_positions.title: Semi-senior Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
In the first three months, I had to give support to PL/SQL database issues.
I had to fix some procedures, functions, triggers, and consistency problems of a large financial database.
In the following three months I led a testing group using tools such as Selenium web driver and Robot Framework of the financial software that I was giving support previously.
In the next six months, I learnt and worked on one of the biggest web solutions that company offered to the market: a web based software for managing and customising processes of any kind, mostly used by financial companies. This software used Java EE to build the web modules for the Backend and AngujarJS for the Frontend.
After a year I became the leader of the Backend team where I had to organised and distributed the tasks to the team members. I was responsible for high-quality software.
profile_positions.title: Back-end development Leader

education.degree_name: Angular: De cero a experto creando aplicaciones (Angular 6+)

company.name: TerraPay
company.description:
Headquartered in The UK (London), TerraPay believes that the smallest payment deserves a borderless journey as safe as the largest. 
The company has been building an ever-expanding payments highway that empowers businesses to create transparent customer experiences with an uninterrupted, secure, and real-time global passage for every payment, however small or large. 
Registered and regulated across 26 global markets, TerraPay is a leading global partner to banks, mobile wallets, money transfer operators, merchants, and financial institutions, creating a more expansive and inclusive international financial ecosystem. 
With access to payments infrastructure that spans the globe, their partners become beacons of the promise of global financial inclusion.
